title: bestofuse12
author: bestofuse12
content: Hello I own a few Casascius not redeemed.Back then I read that the PK could deteriorate with time.I want to know where we are at with this theory?My coin are well preserved, but I would not like losing some BTC stored in it.Cheers!

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: I have not heard of any Casascius coins private keys being found deteriorating. If anything the paper is under a holo hidden away from light and if stored in a dry capsule they should not be affected.   You can read about my thoughts about this on my posts and discussion here on this thread.... https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5463281.msg62725811#msg62725811

comments.author: tldr-hodl
comments.body: As for Titans, there are other... issues:https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5369583.0Short version is you better have a PK (as opposed to 2FA) version AND know your public address.If your answer to both is yes, you're alright.
